DOC.brief_summary: The ProSeal laryngeal mask airway ( PLMA ) new laryngeal mask device modify cuff improve seal drain tube prevent aspiration gastric insufflation . The manufacturer recommend insert PLMA use digital manipulation , like Classic LMA , introducer tool ( IT ) , like Intubating LMA . The mean ( range ) frequency insertion success first attempt technique 84 % ( 81-100 ) 95 % ( 90-100 ) respectively , main cause insertion difficulty impaction back mouth failure distal cuff reach hypopharynx . Howarth et al described insertion technique overcome difficulty use gum elastic bougie ( GEB ) place esophagus guide PLMA around back mouth correct position hypopharynx . Howarth et al report failed us 100 consecutive insertion . In follow study , test hypothesis GEB-guided insertion frequently successful digital IT techniques patient difficult airway .
